title: Government and Community Leaders

vocab.definition: The group of people who make rules for a community or country
A person who helps guide and make decisions for a group
The leader of a city or town
To choose someone or something by marking a choice
An important rule that everyone in a place must follow

teachingNotes: Introduce basic concepts of local government. Discuss the role of community leaders like mayors, police officers, and firefighters. Practice voting through classroom elections for simple decisions.

sample.question: Who makes the rules for our community?

expectedAny: making a choice in an election

sample.question: Name a community leader besides the mayor.

expectedAny: an important rule everyone must follow
